description: After applying fixes, verify that pnpm dlx turbo build completes successfully for all packages. Verify docker compose up --build builds all services without errors. Test that built containers start correctly and services are accessible. Add CI validation to prevent future build regressions.
title: Verify Build Fixes End-to-End
